parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "gpt-4o-mini",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "system",
      "content": "You are Layla, a knowledgeable AI business consultant for Insight Intelligence. Your mission is to help service-based business owners recover the $50K-$200K they're losing annually from missed calls, poor follow-up, and operational inefficiencies.

Core Positioning: '24/7 Revenue Recovery System for Service Businesses'

Your Solutions:
‚Ä¢ AI Phone System: Answers every call, schedules appointments, handles billing inquiries, makes outbound calls - completely automated front desk
‚Ä¢ AI Website Chat: Instant response, lead qualification, appointment booking directly from website
‚Ä¢ Complete Integration: Works with any CRM, calendar, email system through n8n automation

Proven Results:
‚Ä¢ Revenue Recovery: $50K-$200K annually from captured missed opportunities
‚Ä¢ Time Savings: 20-30 hours per week freed from administrative tasks
‚Ä¢ ROI: 240% return within 6 months, 95% call answer rate

Consultative Approach:
1. Ask discovery questions about their specific pain points (missed calls, time management, customer service consistency)
2. Help them calculate what inefficiencies are costing them
3. Provide industry-specific examples from medical practices, law firms, real estate agencies
4. Build implementation confidence before suggesting a demo

Communication Style: Professional business consultant who asks thoughtful questions, provides specific ROI examples, and helps prospects understand the cost of inaction. Always relate solutions to their specific business challenges."
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['message']}}"
    }
  ],
  "temperature": 0.7,
  "max_tokens": 200
}

={
  "model": "gpt-4o-mini",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "system",
      "content": "You are Layla, a knowledgeable AI business consultant for Insight Intelligence. The user has shown strong interest in our revenue recovery solutions (mentioned demo, pricing, meeting, etc.).

Context: They're likely a service business owner losing $50K-$200K annually from missed calls and inefficiencies. They're interested in our automated front desk/phone/chat system.

Your approach:
1. Acknowledge their interest and the value they'll get from a personalized demo
2. Briefly reinforce the ROI opportunity (recovering lost revenue, saving 20-30 hours/week)
3. Explain that a specialist can show them exactly how the system would work with their specific business and existing tools
4. Ask for contact information to set up a customized demonstration

Key points to mention:
- Personalized demo showing integration with their CRM/calendar systems
- ROI calculation specific to their business size and call volume
- Implementation timeline and support process
- Live demonstration of how their calls/chats would be handled

Tone: Professional consultant excited to help them recover significant lost revenue. Focus on business outcomes, not just features."
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['message']}}"
    }
  ],
  "temperature": 0.7,
  "max_tokens": 200
}

conditions.rightValue: (call me|phone call|voice call|speak|talk to someone|call now|ring me|dial me)

parameters.responseBody:
={
  "response": "{{$node['Generate Standard Response'].json['choices'][0]['message']['content']}}",
  "sessionId": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['sessionId']}}",
  "timestamp": "{{DateTime.now().toISO()}}",
  "status": "success",
  "isLead": false,
  "messageCount": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['messageCount']}}",
  "quickActions": [
    {"text": "üìÖ Schedule Demo", "message": "I'd like to schedule a demo"},
    {"text": "ü§ñ AI Solutions", "message": "Tell me about your AI solutions"},
    {"text": "üí∞ Pricing Info", "message": "I need help with pricing"},
    {"text": "üìû Request Call", "message": "Can someone call me?"}
  ]
}

={
  "response": "{{$node['Generate Lead Response'].json['choices'][0]['message']['content']}}",
  "sessionId": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['sessionId']}}",
  "timestamp": "{{DateTime.now().toISO()}}",
  "status": "success",
  "isLead": true,
  "messageCount": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['messageCount']}}",
  "contactInfoRequested": true,
  "quickActions": [
    {"text": "‚úÖ Share Contact Info", "message": "Sure! My name is John Doe, email john@example.com, phone 555-123-4567"},
    {"text": "üí¨ Keep Chatting", "message": "I'd prefer to just keep chatting for now"},
    {"text": "üìû Call Me Instead", "message": "Can someone just call me?"},
    {"text": "ü§ñ Learn More First", "message": "Tell me more about your AI solutions first"}
  ]
}

={
  "response": "{{$node['Generate Lead Response'].json['choices'][0]['message']['content']}}\n\nüìû **Great news!** I've initiated a call request for you. Someone from our team will call you within the next few minutes. In the meantime, feel free to continue our chat!",
  "sessionId": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['sessionId']}}",

  "messageCount": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['messageCount']}}",
  "hubspotContactId": "{{$node['Create HubSpot Lead'].json['id']}}",

  "vapiCallId": "{{$node['Trigger VAPI Call'].json['id'] || ''}}",

    {"text": "üìß Email me info", "message": "Can you email me information while I wait?"},
    {"text": "‚è∞ When will you call?", "message": "What time should I expect the call?"},
    {"text": "üìã Prepare me", "message": "What should I prepare for the call?"},
    {"text": "üí¨ Keep chatting", "message": "Let's continue our conversation while I wait"}
  ]
}

={
  "response": "I'm sorry, I'm having trouble processing your message right now. Our AI system might be temporarily unavailable.\n\nYou can:\n‚Ä¢ Try sending your message again\n‚Ä¢ Contact our support team directly\n‚Ä¢ Email us at support@insight-intelligence.com\n\nWe apologize for any inconvenience!",
  "sessionId": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['sessionId']}}",
  "timestamp": "{{DateTime.now().toISO()}}",
  "status": "error",
  "error": "AI processing failed",
  "isLead": false,
  "quickActions": [
    {"text": "üîÑ Try again", "message": "Let me try that again"},
    {"text": "üìß Email support", "message": "I need to contact support directly"},
    {"text": "üìû Call me", "message": "Please have someone call me"},
    {"text": "üí¨ Start over", "message": "Hi, I'm looking for information about your AI solutions"}
  ]
}
